original_text: There may be a foreign person who lives among you. He may want to join you to eat the Lord's Passover meal. But he must first be circumcised as well as all the men in his house. Then he can join with you and eat the Passover meal. He will be like a man who has been born in Israel. But no male person without circumcision can join the Passover feast.
korean_text: 너희와 함께 거류하는 타국인이 여호와의 유월절을 지키고자 하거든 그 모든 남자는 할례를 받은 후에야 가까이 하여 지킬지니 곧 그는 본토인과 같이 될 것이나 할례 받지 못한 자는 먹지 못할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: There may be a foreign person
He may want to join you
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희와 함께하고 싶을 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: to eat the Lord's Passover meal
But he must first be circumcised
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 먼저 할례를 받아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: as well as all the men in his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 집에 있는 모든 남자들과 마찬가지로

sentences.original_text: Then he can join with you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그가 너희와 함께할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: He will be like a man
who has been born in Israel
But no male person without circumcision
